stimulusHtml: The number of people who have entered a museum on a certain day is modeled by a function f(t), where t is measured in hours since the museum opened that day. The number of people who have left the museum since it opened that same day is modeled by a function g(t). If  f ′ ( t ) = 380 ( 1.02 t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45CD@ and g ′ ( t ) = 240 + 240 sin ( π ( t − 4 ) 12 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4F53@ , at what time t, for 1 ≤ t ≤ 11, is the number of people in the museum at a maximum?
